to fear
бояться
rtega_mnemonic:

惧惧		fear, be afraid of, dread
  • scared 瞿 heart 忄
  • ⓢ heart 忄 threatened with a tool 具: scared
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 惧)
Pictophonetic: 瞿 indicates the sound; 忄 (heart) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples: 懼怕 [ jù pà ]: to be afraid
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 忄 [ xīn ] heart; mind; soul
    • 瞿 [ jù ] startled; surname
heisig_chinese_memo: He used to have a fragile state of mind and be frightened but now the adolscent turkey looks the older male turkeys right in their two eyeballs ready to challenge them.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Data gets to be frightened when they bring out the eye-stretching tool to try to give him the state of mind by forcing him to watch disturbing movies.
humanum_full_description_en:
The original meaning of " fear " is fear. "Said Wen": "Fear, fear. From the heart, the sound of the Qu sound. Stupefied, the ancient Chinese." Duan Yucai's note: "Fear, the fear is also. Xian said: "Fear also." Sound. It meets the cut. Five parts. Luan, ancient literary. For those who look at the left and right. The shape, sound and the meaning." There are two ways of saying " fear " in the ancient prose " Yan ". One is "The elephant has eyes and beak." The eagle head looks terrible" (Liu Xinglong), one is that "people are afraid but they disagree and look at each other" (Shang Chengzuo), Gu Bei said. Gu Yankui said in a comprehensive way that "it means that the owl is staring and staring at left and right."

Bronze inscriptions use its original meaning, such as Zhongshan Wangding: "The widow is afraid that it is suddenly unavailable", " fear ", fear, and express worry. " Qi " refers to Lao Jia, the courtier of King Zhongshan. The whole sentence means that King Zhongshan is worried that Lao Jia's life will soon be over.

Bamboo slips in the Warring States period often use their original meaning, such as "Tsinghua Bamboo Slips II. "Lian Year" Jane 106: "Cai Zhaohou Shen fears, he belongs to Wu", " Shen " is the name of Cai Zhaohou, " Fear " expresses fear. Han silk books often use its original meaning, such as "Mawangdui. "Warring States Political Strategist Book" line 38: "The minister is very afraid."

" Fear " also means "矍". Such as "Mawangdui. Sixty-four hexagrams. The sixth line of "Chen (Zhen)": "Fear of fear", "Fear of fear" is written in the popular version of "Yi": "矍矍". Wang Bi's note: "You have no peace of mind." Kong Yingdashu: "You can't take care of yourself." He said that his eyes were wandering due to panic.
humanum_short_description_en: " Fear " starts with the sound of " heart " and " qu ". The original meaning is fear.
humanum_full_description:
「懼」的本義為害怕。《說文》：「懼，恐也。从心，瞿聲。愳，古文。」段玉裁注：「懼，恐也。恐下曰：『懼也。』是爲轉注。从心，瞿聲。其遇切。五部。愳，古文。䀠者，左右視也。形聲兼會意。」關於「懼」古文「愳」之形義，有兩種說法，一為「象有眼有喙的鷹頭，樣子可怕」（劉興隆），一為「人恐懼則心目交異而左右視」（商承祚），姑備二說。谷衍奎則綜合二說認為「表示貓頭鷹瞪大兩眼左右驚視的樣子」。

　　金文用其本義，如中山王鼎：「寡人懼其忽然不可得」，「懼」，恐懼，表示擔心。「其」指中山王的臣子老賈。全句意謂中山王擔心老賈命不久矣。

　　戰國竹簡多用其本義，如《清華簡二．繫年》簡106：「蔡昭侯申懼，自歸於吳」，「申」為蔡昭侯之名，「懼」表示恐懼。漢帛書亦多用其本義，如《馬王堆．戰國縱橫家書》第38行：「臣甚懼」。

　　「懼」亦通「矍」。如《馬王堆．六十四卦．辰（震）》第6行：「視懼懼」，「懼懼」通行本《易》作：「矍矍」。王弼注：「矍，無所安視也。」孔穎達疏：「矍矍，視不專之容。」表示由於驚慌而目光游移不定。

懼怕 [ jù pà ]: to be afraid
(Simplified: 惧)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 瞿 indicates the sound; 忄 (heart) conveys the meaning.
HSK: 6
Chinese: He used to have a fragile state of mind and be frightened but now the adolscent turkey looks the older male turkeys right in their two eyeballs ready to challenge them.
Meaning: be frightened
Hanzi: 惧
Story: Data gets to be frightened when they bring out the eye-stretching tool to try to give him the state of mind by forcing him to watch disturbing movies.
Kind: traditional

「 懼 」的本義為害怕。《說文》：「懼，恐也。从心，瞿聲。愳，古文。」段玉裁注：「懼，恐也。恐下曰：『懼也。』是爲轉注。从心，瞿聲。其遇切。五部。愳，古文。䀠者，左右視也。形聲兼會意。」關於「 懼 」古文「 愳 」之形義，有兩種說法，一為「象有眼有喙的鷹頭，樣子可怕」（劉興隆），一為「人恐懼則心目交異而左右視」（商承祚），姑備二說。谷衍奎則綜合二說認為「表示貓頭鷹瞪大兩眼左右驚視的樣子」。 金文用其本義，如中山王鼎：「寡人懼其忽然不可得」，「 懼 」，恐懼，表示擔心。「 其 」指中山王的臣子老賈。全句意謂中山王擔心老賈命不久矣。 戰國竹簡多用其本義，如《清華簡二．繫年》簡106：「蔡昭侯申懼，自歸於吳」，「 申 」為蔡昭侯之名，「 懼 」表示恐懼。漢帛書亦多用其本義，如《馬王堆．戰國縱橫家書》第38行：「臣甚懼」。 「 懼 」亦通「 矍 」。如《馬王堆．六十四卦．辰（震）》第6行：「視懼懼」，「懼懼」通行本《易》作：「矍矍」。王弼注：「矍，無所安視也。」孔穎達疏：「矍矍，視不專之容。」表示由於驚慌而目光游移不定。

The eagle head looks terrible" (Liu Xinglong), one is that "people are afraid but they disagree and look at each other" (Shang Chengzuo), Gu Bei said. Gu Yankui said in a comprehensive way that "it means that the owl is staring and staring at left and right." 懼字的基本解释

懼
jù
见“惧”。

懼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jù］
［《廣韻》其遇切，去遇，羣。］
亦作“愳1”。“惧1”的繁体字。
(1)恐惧；害怕。
(2)戒惧。
(3)忧虑。
(4)恐吓；威胁。
(5)病。
(6)通“瞿”。惊视貌。参见“懼然”。

懼字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　懼； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页408第43
〔古文〕愳?【唐韻】其遇切【集韻】【韻會】衢遇切，?音具。【說文】恐也。从心瞿聲。或省作瞿。　又【集韻】俱遇切【正韻】居遇切，?音屨。【集韻】無守貌。　又【集韻】懽俱切，音劬。亦恐也。【前漢·惠帝贊】聞叔孫通之諫，則懼然。【東方朔傳】吳王懼然易容。

懼字的源字形

字源演变：

金文楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
懼字的起名意思

暂无。
